name: deer hunter II
description:
• find corpses and items of previous players 💀

Controls

WASD - walk
LMB - use
RMB - drop
E - interact
Shift - run
Control - crouch
Escape - menu

Note: on Mac OSX, rotate the camera by dragging and use items with space bar.
(Game Maker's mouse lock function doesn't work on Mac)
